sellorder.solanaOnly: Only one Solana chain can be selected.
sellorder.noticeTitle: [Notice] Please read the following carefully before proceeding to the next step.

noticePoints.checkAddress: Before making a deposit, make sure the copied wallet address is correct. Paste it into a memo to double-check.
noticePoints.wrongAddress: If you deposit to the wrong wallet address, we cannot recover your funds.
noticePoints.solanaSupport: Only Solana (SOL) chain is supported. Platforms like Binance, Bybit, and wallets like Phantom support Solana.
noticePoints.otherChainsUnsupported: Deposits via TRC-20, ERC-20, or other chains are not supported.
noticePoints.usdtRateVaries: The USDT price may vary based on Korean exchange rates.
noticePoints.usdtFixedPriceNote: USDT rates may slightly fluctuate depending on transaction completion time.

sellorder.confirmationText: I hereby acknowledge that I have carefully read and understood all of the above notices. I accept full responsibility for any financial loss caused by not following them.
